trans-unit.source: Azure Authenticator app for mobile phones
trans-unit.target: Azure Authenticator app for mobile phones

trans-unit.source: Learn how to upgrade to the latest version of Azure Authenticatior.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to upgrade to the latest version of Azure Authenticatior.

trans-unit.source: Moving to the new Azure Authenticator app
trans-unit.target: Moving to the new Azure Authenticator app

trans-unit.source: With the release of the Azure Authenticator app, available for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458), the old Multi-Factor Authentication app is being replaced.
trans-unit.target: With the release of the Azure Authenticator app, available for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458), the old Multi-Factor Authentication app is being replaced.

trans-unit.source: The Multi-Factor Authentication app will continue to work but should you decide to move to the new Azure Authenticator app then this article can assist you.
trans-unit.target: The Multi-Factor Authentication app will continue to work but should you decide to move to the new Azure Authenticator app then this article can assist you.

trans-unit.source: How to move to the new Azure Authenticator app
trans-unit.target: How to move to the new Azure Authenticator app

trans-unit.source: **Step 1:** Install Azure Authenticator.
trans-unit.target: **Step 1:** Install Azure Authenticator.

trans-unit.source: Cloud
trans-unit.target: Cloud

trans-unit.source: **Step 2:** Activate your accounts with the new app
trans-unit.target: **Step 2:** Activate your accounts with the new app

trans-unit.source: First of all make sure, you have the QR code or code and URL for manual entry handy for the account you’d like to add to the app.
trans-unit.target: First of all make sure, you have the QR code or code and URL for manual entry handy for the account you’d like to add to the app.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Not sure of how to get the QR code?
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Not sure of how to get the QR code?

trans-unit.source: Contact your help desk for assistance.
trans-unit.target: Contact your help desk for assistance.

trans-unit.source: Unable to activate your account with the new app?
trans-unit.target: Unable to activate your account with the new app?

trans-unit.source: Contact your help desk.
trans-unit.target: Contact your help desk.

trans-unit.source: Once you have the QR code in front of you, launch the app.
trans-unit.target: Once you have the QR code in front of you, launch the app.

trans-unit.source: Click +.
trans-unit.target: Click +.

trans-unit.source: Cloud
trans-unit.target: Cloud

trans-unit.source: This will launch the camera to scan the QR code.
trans-unit.target: This will launch the camera to scan the QR code.

trans-unit.source: If you are unable to scan the QR code, you always have the manual entry option.
trans-unit.target: If you are unable to scan the QR code, you always have the manual entry option.

trans-unit.source: To confirm that the account is successfully activated, verify that the new account shows up on the accounts pages.
trans-unit.target: To confirm that the account is successfully activated, verify that the new account shows up on the accounts pages.

trans-unit.source: Follow this step for all your accounts that you’d like to migrate to the new app.
trans-unit.target: Follow this step for all your accounts that you’d like to migrate to the new app.

trans-unit.source: **Step 3:** Uninstall the old Multi-Factor Authentication app from your phone.
trans-unit.target: **Step 3:** Uninstall the old Multi-Factor Authentication app from your phone.

trans-unit.source: Once you have added all the accounts to the new app uninstall the old app from your phone.
trans-unit.target: Once you have added all the accounts to the new app uninstall the old app from your phone.

trans-unit.source: Curious how to remove individual accounts from the old app?
trans-unit.target: Curious how to remove individual accounts from the old app?

trans-unit.source: Tap on the account.
trans-unit.target: Tap on the account.

trans-unit.source: You’ll get an option to “Delete”.
trans-unit.target: You’ll get an option to “Delete”.

trans-unit.source: Cloud
trans-unit.target: Cloud

trans-unit.target: Additional Resources

trans-unit.source: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication on MSDN
trans-unit.target: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication on MSDN

trans-unit.source: Azure Authenticator app for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458).
trans-unit.target: Azure Authenticator app for [Windows Phone](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/azure-authenticator/03a5b2bf-6066-418f-b569-e8aecbc06e50), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.azure.authenticator), and [IOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/azure-authenticator/id983156458).
